statements: I tried to leave west of here...
But there were just endless hallways.  As far as the eye could see...
I couldn't find my way through.
I tried to leave south of here...
But it was just a desert.  I walked around, but there was nothing there.
It was depressing, so I came back here.
I tried to leave east of here...
But I couldn't see any way forward.  It was too dark.
Maybe I was missing something.  Oh well.
Ooooo...
I didn't get to finish my book.  And I worked so hard on it...
But at least I won't have to worry about the deadline anymore.
Look, I'm just trying to keep a sense of humor about all this, okay?
I've heard about a settlement of ghosts to the far north of here.
But the short route to get there collapsed.
The only ways to get there now are really dangerous.
Oh, it's dangerous out there?
What's the worst that could happen?  We're already dead!
I've been granted a vision...
Souls from all over, being pulled through a rift.
Given new purpose, unable to pass away, they shuffle all around us.
But to what end?  What ties them to this place?
Underground...a bright core, radiating energy.
can't go on much longer
who am I
where am I
what is happening
when
will
it
end
they spread everywhere
tearing this place apart
they are hungry
but they do not feed
her warmth is still here
is it for the Sun
the teeth cannot approach it
